resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water: The Flow of Women's Work</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser: Der Fluß der Arbeit der Frauen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau : L'écoulement du travail des femmes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água: O fluxo do trabalho das mulheres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua: Il flusso del lavoro delle donne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύδωρ: Η ροή της εργασίας των γυναικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua: El flujo del trabajo de las mujeres</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">helps students compare the division of labor around water-related work in their own homes to families in rural Lesotho to gain an understanding of the multiple factors influencing gender role formation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hilfen Kursteilnehmer vergleichen die 
Arbeitsteilung um Wasser-in Verbindung stehende Arbeit in ihren 
eigenen Häusern mit Familien in landwirtschaftlichem Lesotho, um ein 
Verständnis der mehrfachen Faktoren zu gewinnen, die Geschlechtrolle 
Anordnung beeinflussen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les étudiants d'aides comparent la division du 
travail autour du travail eau-connexe dans leurs propres maisons aux 
familles au Lesotho rural pour gagner un arrangement des facteurs 
multiples influençant la formation de rôle de genre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os estudantes das ajudas comparam a divisão de 
trabalho em torno de trabalho água-relacionado em suas próprias HOME
às famílias em Lesotho rural para ganhar uma compreensão dos 
fatores múltiplos que influenciam a formação do papel do gender.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gli allievi di aiuti confrontano la divisione del 
lavoro intorno a lavoro acqua-relativo nelle loro proprie sedi 
alle famiglie nel Lesoto rurale per guadagnare una comprensione dei 
fattori multipli che influenzano la formazione di ruolo di genere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βοηθά τους σπουδαστές να συγκρίνουν το τμήμα της 
εργασίας γύρω από την ύδωρ-σχετική με τον εργασία στα σπίτια 
τους με τις οικογένειες στο αγροτικό Λεσόθο για να κερδίσει μια 
κατανόηση των πολλαπλάσιων παραγόντων που επηρεάζουν το 
σχηματισμό ρόλου γένους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los estudiantes de las ayudas comparan la 
división del trabajo alrededor de trabajo agua-relacionado en sus 
propios hogares a las familias en Lesotho rural para ganar una 
comprensión de los factores múltiples que influencian la formación 
del papel del género.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207015</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108776</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-the-flow-of-womens-work</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
